docs.lead_paragraph: Nail salons in New York were warned on Monday to respect the rights of their workers or face closure under proposed legislation that has won the backing of immigrant groups.

docs.lead_paragraph: Arizona families can now get welfare for no more than one year in their lifetime — the shortest time limit in the nation.

docs.lead_paragraph: The liquid is dark red, a mixture of fat and blood, and Dr. Mark Berman pumps it out of the patient's backside. He treats it with a chemical, runs it through a processor — and injects it into the woman's aching knees and elbows.

headline.main: Stem Cell 'Wild West' Takes Root Amid Lack of US Regulation
headline.print_headline: Stem Cell 'Wild West' Takes Root Amid Lack of US Regulation

docs.snippet: The liquid is dark red, a mixture of fat and blood, and Dr. Mark Berman pumps it out of the patient's backside. He treats it with a chemical, runs it through a processor — and injects it into the woman's aching knees and elbows.

docs.lead_paragraph: The legislation would subject salons in New York to some of the strictest health regulations in the country and give regulators greater authority to punish those that mistreat workers.

headline.main: Cuomo to Offer New Measures to Improve Conditions in the Nail Salon Industry
headline.print_headline: Cuomo to Offer 2 Measures to Alter Nail Salon Industry

docs.abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo will introduce two new measures to give regulators greater authority to make it easier for manicurists to acquire licenses and to punish salons that mistreat their workers; follows emergency rule changes in response to New York Times investigation finding widespread exploitation in industry.
docs.snippet: The legislation would subject salons in New York to some of the strictest health regulations in the country and give regulators greater authority to punish those that mistreat workers.
